inclusion.criterion: capable of giving written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: negative pregnancy test on enrolment day
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: documented BV infection by positive vaginal swab +/- positive whiff test/pH > 4.5
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: agree to no intercourse for the 10 days of treatment (or to use non-lubricated condoms if unavoidable)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: agree not to douche or use any intravaginal products during treatment (including tampons, medications, devices)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: abstain from alcohol during the 10 days of treatment (from 24 hours before through 72 hours after taking study medication)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: agree to no new medications or antibiotics during treatment
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: negative vaginal swab regardless of whiff test/pH > 4.5
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: symptoms so severe as to make allocation to placebo unacceptable to the patient
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: currently pregnant or at high risk for pregnancy
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: current sexually transmitted infection (HIV, hepatitis, chlamydia, gonorrhea)
exclusion.label: triggers
